reviewText: We bought the series so this is a logical end for it as a movie. The plott is better for the movie than the series, surely "G" in a rateing and had merit. Makes for good view with the kids, or Grandkids.

reviewText: I was so excited last year when I aw that they were finally releasing the original "Grizzly Adams" series on DVD.  I had loved it as a kid and have enjoyed the joy as an adult even more than I would have expected.I had hoped from the beginning that they would put out a DVD that included the pilot/theatrical movie as well as this return movie.  So I give them 4 stars for putting this out and would have given 5 if they had included that first movie, too.  Maybe next year!
